description: Try our easy to follow Zucchini Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Video,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Zucchini Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grate 6 zucchinis and place in a colander. Sprinkle with 2 tsp salt and stand for 10 minutes. Squeeze out as much liquid as possible and place in a large bowl.

Add 1 cup gluten-free plain flour, 1/2 cup gluten-free cornflour, 1 tsp gluten-free baking powder, 4 finely chopped green shallots, 200g crumbled feta, 1 cup grated parmesan, 3 whisked eggs, 1/3 cup chopped dill and pepper to taste.
Heat 1/3 cup of olive oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. When hot, drop tablespoonfuls of the mixture into the oil and cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through.
Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining mixture. Serve with sour cream and dill.
